rows.label: qst640201_msg0001
rows.name:
How are things with the shop,
Jennifora?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, Yuou! Things are going very
well, thank you.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0003
rows.name:
Students are snapping up Snipe Flans
left and right, I can barely keep Neon 
Cookies in stock...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0004
rows.name:
And not a day goes by without a child
or two grinning with the first bite of a
Lovemerry Cake. It's great, all in all!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0005
rows.name: I'm glad to hear this.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0006
rows.name:
There is one thing I would like
to talk to you about, though.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0007
rows.name: Oh? What's that?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, the name of Just Desserts has
spread well beyond Fons Maim.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0009
rows.name:
I've been getting requests from all
corners of Alst.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0010
rows.name:
People want to eat your sweets,
Yuou, and are willing to pay a
premium to get them.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0011
rows.name:
They don't even seem to mind covering
shipping out of their own pockets!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0012
rows.name: Hmmm...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm glad to hear it, but there's no
way for me to make my desserts
last any longer than they do...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0014
rows.name:
I know it's not the most convenient
for our fans, but in the end they'll
have to keep coming to us...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0015
rows.name: Idaten!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0016
rows.name: Now there's an idea...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0017
rows.name:
Idaten could certainly handle
deliveries for us.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0018
rows.name: What a great idea!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0019
rows.name:
Hey, Idaten! Come over here
for a second, would ya?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0020
rows.name: Whuh? Oh, hiya!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0021
rows.name:
I've got a favor to ask you, Idaten.
People all over Alst want to eat the
desserts we make here, but...

rows.label: qst640201_msg0022
rows.name:
There's just the problem of delivering
them. The desserts don't last long, so I
need someone very fast on deliveries.

rows.label: qst640201_msg0023
rows.name:
And I don't know anyone speedier
than you. So, what do you think? Could
you help us out here?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0024
rows.name: No problem!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0025
rows.name:
You know me, always glad to 
help out a friend in need!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0026
rows.name:
Ah, great! Jennifora here will tell
you the orders and where to get
them to, all right?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0027
rows.name: Yep!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0028
rows.name:
First off, we've got ten Lovemerry
Cakes to go to Ciamran in Superbia.
Can you handle that?

rows.label: qst640201_msg0029
rows.name: Consider it delivered!

rows.label: qst640201_msg0030
rows.name:
Thanks, Idaten. I guess I'll leave
you to it, then!
